text.title: Conductor Israel Yinon dies after collapsing on stage
text.head: Conductor Israel Yinon dies after collapsing on stage
Sources

list.item: "Renowned Israeli conductor dies on stage during concert" — The Times of Israel , January 30, 2015
Tim McFarlan. "Internationally renowned conductor drops dead in front of screaming audience and musicians during a symphony in Switzerland" — Mail Online , January 30, 2015
